slo.name: SLO 1: Request Response Time
slo.description: Ensure the average response time for requests does not exceed 200ms.

sli.name: SLIs - Average Response Time
sli.description: The average time taken to respond to a request.

sli.name: SLIs - Error Rate
sli.description: The percentage of requests that result in an error.

alerts.name: Alert - High Request Response Time
alerts.description: Trigger an alert if the average response time exceeds 300ms for more than 5 minutes.

alerts.name: Alert - High Error Rate
alerts.description: Trigger an alert if the error rate exceeds 5% for more than 10 minutes.

explanation: The SLOs are derived from the key performance indicators for the service, focusing on response time and error rate. The SLIs are extracted from the provided metrics: average response time and error rate. Alerts are set up to notify when the response time exceeds 300ms or the error rate exceeds 5%.
llm_suggestions: Implement request retries for transient errors.
Monitor critical resources using custom metrics and alerts.
